hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$5{:}11$ is $11$ minutes after $5{:}00$. 



[[☃ image 1]]

 

So, we move $11$ tick marks past $5{:}00$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 5:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 6:00. The first tick mark after 10 is labeled 5:11. An orange line moves right along the number line from 5:00 to 5:11. !

hints.content:
This number line shows $5{:}11$ graphed:



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 5:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 6:00.  The first tick mark after 10 is labeled B. !

question.content:
**On which number line is $5{:}11$ graphed?**

[[☃ radio 1]]
